title: Episode 106: The Psychology of Hope
itunes:author: UW-Green Bay Psychology Department
itunes:summary: In this final episode of the season, Georjeanna and Ryan share research on hope, resiliency, and happiness and discuss it in the context of the covid19 pandemic. They end on a positive note when listeners call in to share what’s giving them hope.
itunes:subtitle: In this final episode of the season, Georjeanna a…
description: In this final episode of the season, Georjeanna and Ryan share research on hope, resiliency, and happiness and discuss it in the context of the covid19 pandemic. They end on a positive note when listeners call in to share what’s giving them hope.
